content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    location_id,
    COUNT(*) records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dp203anpnt.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE

    )
    WITH(
    location_id SMALLINT 1, 
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2, 
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3, 
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )  AS taxi_zone
GROUP BY location_id 
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
